Increase count of Atlantean Glass Loot Generator drop for Named mobs. (count * lootgenerator_atlanteanglass_named_count)

The number of seconds from last kill the this lord is worth no RP.
Number of Entries cleaned from Line of Sight (LoS) Manager each Cleanup ticks, if you need to go above 10 000 entries consider using a shorter cleanup frequency.
How fast should the Line of Sight (LoS) Manager clean up its data (in milliseconds), don't get under 30000 ms, raise cleanup count if you put high number here.
Line of Sight (LoS) Manager Contamination will use this to lower or raise the Z checks when updating LoS checks. 0 = Z must be exact, 1 = Z range is radius.
Set the Level of Debug for the Line of Sight (LoS) Manager (do not set level 3 in production), 0 = no debug, 1 = info, 2 = warn, 3 = debug.
Enable the Line of Sight Manager where overriden methods are implemented.
Set Timeout (in milliseconds) for EvE Line of Sight (LoS) Manager cache data, 0 to disable. (Should be at least 2 times PvE cache to lower LoS Queries)
Line of Sight (LoS) Manager won't check LoS for Mobs vs Mobs within this range. (Shouldn't be under PvE Threshold)
Line of Sight (LoS) Manager will update LoS of Keep Guards in this range of the checker, raising this value will pack more Guards when Aggroing.
Line of Sight (LoS) Manager will update LoS of Mobs/NPCs in this range of the checker if target is a Mob, and highest value used for contamination LoS updates.
Line of Sight (LoS) Manager will update LoS of Mobs/NPCs in this range of the checker, and highest value used for Player contamination LoS updates.
Line of Sight (LoS) Manager will update LoS of Player's Pet in this range of the checker, keep value low to prevent abuses.
Line of Sight (LoS) Manager will update LoS of Players in this range of the checker, should be disabled to prevent PvP abuses.
Line of Sight (LoS) Manager will try to reduce player queries to this frequency (in millisecond), raise this if player are experiencing lags.
Set Timeout (in milliseconds) for PvE Line of Sight (LoS) Manager cache data, 0 to disable. (Should be slightly above Brain Think timer to have any effect)
Line of Sight (LoS) Manager won't check LoS for mobs and NPC within this range. (Shouldn't be under default to prevent LoS flood)
Set Timeout (in milliseconds) for PvP Line of Sight (LoS) Manager cache data, 0 to disable.
Line of Sight (LoS) Manager won't check LoS for players within this range. (Should be low to prevent abuses)
Timeout (in milliseconds) until Line of Sight (LoS) Manager tries to resend a LoS check, -1 to disable (don't get under 100ms except for Local Network).
How often are we allowed to check LOS on the same player (seconds)
